title: InterLynk
summary: InterLynk is a modern FinTech web application built with React and Tailwind CSS. It combines secure digital business cards with link-in-bio functionality, providing professionals a scalable and responsive platform. This project highlights CurryDevs’ expertise in finance-focused web development with performance, security, and SEO optimization in mind.

title: Brevix
summary: Brevix is a scalable business operations platform developed using Next.js and TypeScript. It offers URL-shortening, task management, and real-time insights, optimized for enterprise workflows. CurryDevs delivered a high-performance, responsive, and modern SaaS solution that streamlines business operations efficiently.

title: Torque Craft
summary: Torque Craft is an automotive web platform built with Astro and TypeScript. Designed for speed, scalability, and SEO, it provides a modern, responsive interface for automotive parts and tools. This project demonstrates CurryDevs’ ability to craft industry-specific digital solutions with high performance and precision design.

title: Predictive Analytics
summary: Predictive Analytics is a business intelligence solution built with R and Python. It provides advanced forecasting and data-driven insights to help companies make smarter decisions. CurryDevs ensured the platform is scalable, high-performance, and optimized for responsive data visualization and analytical workflows.
